items.title: The best way to earn billionaire status is to follow in Warren Buffett’s footsteps: 15% of billionaires derive net worth from the finance industry
items.description: U.S. billionaires are collectively worth about $7.6 trillion

items.title: Walmart has spent more than $110 million buying malls this year in a move to become a property owner, not just a tenant
items.description: Walmart already owns most of its locations. But recent deals are part of an emerging pattern.

items.title: Air traffic controllers are becoming Uber drivers and restaurant servers on top of six-day airport shifts to make ends meet during government shutdown
items.description: Deemed essential workers, controllers are required to work during the shutdown, but will receive a $0 paycheck starting next week.

items.title: Former Sears boss says CEOs won’t challenge Trump’s tariffs out of ‘cowardice’—but the holidays are fast approaching, and ‘the party is over’
items.description: He expects many shelves at retailers will be empty this holiday season.

items.title: Top analyst still thinks we’re on the cusp of a new boom for the economy, but investors aren’t with him: ‘Markets remain choppy’
items.description: Morgan Stanley’s Mike Wilson says he needs to see more before giving the “all-clear” on chances of a further near-term correction.
